snippet: A group of Indonesian investors led by Erick Thohir has agreed to buy 70 percent of Inter Milan in one of the few major foreign deals for a leading Italian soccer club.
abstract: Group of Indonesian investors led by Erick Thohir agrees to buy 70 percent of Inter Milan in one of the few major foreign deals for a leading Italian soccer club.
lead_paragraph: A group of Indonesian investors led by Erick Thohir has agreed to buy 70 percent of Inter Milan in one of the few major foreign deals for a leading Italian soccer club.
